price: Ya ku waɗan da *suka yi ĩmãni! Ku nẽmi taimako da haƙuri game da salla. Lalle ne, Allah na tãre da mãsu haƙuri.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: * Magana kuma ta fuskanta zuwa ga mũminai kawai dõmin a shirya zamansu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū is'taʿīnū bil-ṣabri wal-ṣalati inna al-laha maʿa al-ṣābirīna
